#summary List of runtime JAR dependencies, for version 1.3.

= Dependencies =

JCROM 1.3 depends on the following third party JARs:

  * JCR API, version 1.0 ([http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/javax/jcr/jcr/1.0/jcr-1.0.jar get it here])
  * CGLIB, version 2.1_3 ([http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/cglib/cglib/2.1_3/cglib-2.1_3.jar get it here])
  * ASM, version 1.5.3 (CGLIB depends on this) ([http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/asm/asm/1.5.3/asm-1.5.3.jar get it here])

If you use [http://maven.apache.org Maven2] to build your project, it will automatically download all dependencies for you.
